attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i used to love trump but as soon as i installed this app he showed up to my house kicked my mom in the face, ate my little sister (rip sam) and told me i looked like an Oompa Loompa.

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and it downloaded a virus on my phone called “racism.” Furthermore, it took DAYS to download. Worst app ever made. Filled with violent, hateful, racist, homophobic content.

attributes.title: moving to canada
attributes.review: i’m officially moving to canada bc of this app. i wish that it had never been invented. this somehow managed to put together all of the terrible things abt our president into an easy touch of a screen🤩 i hoped i could find at least one good quality, but nope! alas there were none :).
